fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Read a book to someone, putting them to sleep and roleblock them through immunities

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Your target is sent a pdf with the entire Moby-Dick novel
-With the necronomicon, you gain the ability to beat someone to death with the necronomicon, as well as being able to multitask this with your first ability
